website_summaries.verdict: A smaller version of the 14 cup cooker that still includes pre-sets needed for a variety of grains.
pros: Rice rinse bowl doubles as a steamer basket
Pre-set buttons for hot cereal, whole grains, rice, and steaming food
Works well for soup and steaming vegetables
Does a nice job of fixing rice
cons: Cooking oatmeal in this can sometimes create a mess

customer_reviews.title: Potentially Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product many times. It cooks rice OK. After the rice was done, I would wipe off the inside top of the rice cooker with a paper towel or sponge to remove the residue left behind. Today, I got it out to make some quinoa, and it was coated inside with fuzzy mold. Upon greater inspection, I found black mold behind the rubber seal and in the rolled aluminum that is part of the lid. This is so disgusting and impossible to clean off unless you take the entire product apart, screws and all. And, the rolled aluminum creases remain moldy. DO NOT buy this product. I don't think it's safe. Unless you like mold...
customer_reviews.author: K. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Takes 45 minutes to cook rice, regardless of amount..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be used as a rice cooker, and it takes 45 minutes regardless of the amount of rice you're cooking. It is really a pain to clean because it's one piece. You have to leave the lid open, because the moisture inside will remain inside, unless you clean it out every time.. I ended up buying another one that has the detachable bowl and lid, so you can take that piece out and put the actual cooker away.
customer_reviews.author: jody

customer_reviews.title: Compact and cooks rice a lot better than others
customer_reviews.text: I have used cheaper rice cookers which cooked a lot faster but the quality of rice cooked wasn't the best. I am pleasantly impressed by the quality of cooking. I eat mostly Basmati Rice so unfortunately you can only cook 2 1/2 cups of Basmati using this rice cooker. The rice cooker takes little bit longer when cooking Basmati and end product is as good as cooking in a pot without having to check continuously. This cooker is ideal for two people if you are having mostly rice with your meals.
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Chowdhury

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for rice!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Just wish it didn't automatically keep rice warm for 45 minutes. If there is a way to not have it warm after cooking I havent figured it out. Fantastic for rice. Still working on proprtions for oatmeal -- instructions say put in rice settimg - DON't! Works better on whole grain setting, but still trying to get proprtions correct. I'm concerned that steaming fish would leave the plastic smelling like fish forever (I don't have a dishwasher). But extremely happy with it as rice cooker. If anyone knows best way to make hardboiled eggs in it please tell me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product broken
customer_reviews.text: the product is broketn and I should go to UPS to return it, bit hassle for me
customer_reviews.author: ossy indra wardhani

customer_reviews.title: Best Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: I recently had to retire my three year old rice cooker and this one is amazing! I love the sleek design and I think it cooks my rice perfectly every time. I like that it has a little drainer that catches the water vapor when you open the lid so it doesn't just drip all back into the rice and get soggy. I haven't tried the steamer basket except to use it to rinse the rice, which works great. I think it's a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Farfallelady

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my son He's an EMS worker specially nowadays With the COVID 19 going on he is exhausted Long work hours dealing with these critical times I figured when he get to his house make cooking easier.... He is very happy with this kitchen appliance. I'm glad it's making his life a little easier with one less thing to worry about and still be well fed.
customer_reviews.author: What did I buy‽ :)

customer_reviews.title: If you like rice, steamed meat and veggies look no further.
customer_reviews.text: If you like steamed vegetables and/or rice for a very reasonable price, this item is for you! And believe me, if you’ve never eaten rice from a legitimate rice cooker you haven’t lived! Provides an efficient way to make a complete meal. The only regret is the size. It’s only big enough for a one person meal when utilizing the steam basket. For instance, a slab of salmon and a veggie will fill the basket, but you can make up to 4 cups of rice simultaneously.
customer_reviews.author: Opinionated

customer_reviews.title: Pot quality issue
customer_reviews.text: Only used it twice and the anti stick surface is already peeling off.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Rice Cooker Exploded and Caught on Fire with First Use
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker came brand new in the mail. Once we took it out of the box and used it to cook some rice by plugging it into the outlet, the rice cooker emitted smoke, exploded, and caught on fire in the kitchen!! It was a fire hazard and a dangerous item. I am asking for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Setiawan

customer_reviews.title: Great cooker - works for steel cut oatmeal
customer_reviews.text: The presets are easy to use and intuitive. I have only used this cooker for rice and oatmeal - can't speak to the "sear" and "sautee" functions. But it's a very reliable rice cooker, and the "hot cereal" setting lets you make steel cut oatmeal. The maximum is 10 cups - not 20. But you can make 10 cups - slightly more than half a gallon - without boil over. For rice, I appreciated the rinsing dish, measure and paddle included with the cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: RICE MAKER hit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my bodybuilding teeanager. He is all about grilled chicken and rice after his gym sessions. So easy to use, that he has now taken responsibility for his own rice making. INcludes a spoon and rinsing basket. YAY. Cleans easily too. So far so good. Looks great on the counter. I also ordered the rice keeper /container to pour and measure. My boy is happy and so am I.
customer_reviews.author: sfmmr

customer_reviews.title: Takes an HOUR to cook rice in it, way too long...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this rice cooker. It took over an hour just to cook rice. We had a previous rice cooker with the glass top, and it was so easy to use it. During cooking time, I was able to lift the glass lid and check or stir the rice. Also the rice was ready in 15- 20 minutes. NOT WITH THIS TYPE OF RICE COOKER. Once you lock the heavy top lid, you can't see the cooking process anymore and took an hour to cook the rice. Husband was hungry and grumpy. He wanted to re-buy the old type of ricecooker. So that's what we did. We returned this one and we bought that type of rice cooker again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Buying a Rice Cooker? Either Buy Cheapest or go with a High-end Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Any $15 throw-away rice cooker is better than this "full feature" device unless you spend $100-$150 on a Zujiroshi. It takes twice as long to cook, and then the rice is mushy, and then if you leave it to "warm" it burns the bottom layer. The mystery-metal dish has a Teflon-like coating on the inside, but the exterior black coating weirdly washed off in stages over the next couple of weeks and became discolored. I missed the return date so this is going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: JMP

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this rice cooker. It’s a waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker takes forever to cook. 2 cups rice takes 45 mins to cook. Are you kidding me?? Plus, some parts of the cooked rice were wet and mushy. Tried all sorts of measurement but same result. Better get a traditional rice cooker with one push button which cooks 2 cups of rice in just 15mins. This product is unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Jivlou77

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: So far, it's been easy to use and works pretty great. Did have issues with the initial unit, but was sent a replacement very quickly after advising Amazon. So far, we've cooked rice and steamed fish and both worked out pretty well. Cleaning the top part takes a little effort, but nothing too much
customer_reviews.author: Kirtie

customer_reviews.title: Surprise Honey,, Merry Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: You read correctly but things are Not Always what they appear to mean! I have No idea who is responsible for the packing and shipping but My wife's Christmas Present was revealed as soon as UPS dropped it off at the house. Yes,, the Steamer arrived in the original box with the description, content and colored pictures leaving No doubt as to what the product was and left of course in view for passer-byers to gawk at as well. Disappointed,, Very Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We love rice but hate the hassle of cooking it, this adjusts the time for properly cooking the rice and keeps it warm once it's done. Does take some adjusting on the amount of water to add to get the desired texture but fun figuring it out.
customer_reviews.author: mini

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, cooks well, you do not need to use as much water with the rice as other products, the timer is great and helps you prepare other food to have everything ready at once. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Saville

customer_reviews.title: The non stick coating started to come off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this around 7-8 month ago. I only used it for cooking rice. It was working fine and was easy to use. However the non-stick coating started to come off after few month.
customer_reviews.author: bibek

customer_reviews.title: Requires a lot of manual cleaning, cooks things to perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, cooks my veggies and rice with ease! I love that it comes with a recipe/instruction book, made it easy to get started, i just hate that when i would make quinoa or rice in it there would be tons stuck to the inside of the lid which is a little challenging to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S

customer_reviews.title: I like that you can cook a whole meal in this thing
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the other reviews the rice does take a little while but it does make great rice. Also makes great steamed vegetables, steamed potatoes, poached chicken. And if you want you can put vegetables at the bottom on the steam option with some seasonings and it will give a nice little char. I like it !!️
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Val

customer_reviews.title: Makes cooking a joy
customer_reviews.text: I love this rice cooker. It’s very functional and makes great rice. I love that it isn’t limited to rice as many others are. I gave low marks for easy to clean because the metal plate on the lid is not removable and nearly impossible to clean; it gets a gummy coating of rice starch that doesn’t want to come off, The actual rice bucket and steamer are a dream to clean. Eight cups of rice is pushing it a little maybe—-if you are steaming something in the basket I wouldn’t go over 3-4 cups, but it probably mentions this in the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Catharine Mefford

customer_reviews.title: dinner in a jiffy
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this product and uses it to cook rice, saute and as a pressure cooker. Everything he cooks in it comes out great! Apparently I need to go to cooking school as I have not had the same successes - but I don't think I can blame that on the instapot. I think I just need to take the time to read the instructions and recipies. Surely I will get better 😀
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: How I ever got along without a rice cooker after all these years (77 years old), I will never know. I just put in the ingredients, rice and water, close the lid and BINGO, I have rice cooked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rice cooker/steamer for the single guy.
customer_reviews.text: Great little rice cooker if you only need to make a small amount of rice. I believe you can make up to 4 cups of rice as well as using a steaming basket. Very versatile cooker. Can steam, make rice, make warm cereal. Much smaller than a standard size you would see in a house with a family, but perfect for a single person or the occasional small get-togethers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spew water all over specially when cooking bean soup
customer_reviews.text: I used to have an Aroma rice cooker and cooked it with bean soup, rice congee perfectly all the time for 6 years until I changed to this Hamilton rice cooker. This small cooker is okay with cooking 2 cups of rice (note: the measuring cup is less than a standard 8 oz cup). But when I cooked bean soup following the hot cereal instruction, the water spew from the air vent all over to the counter so I had to stop it! Never tried to use to cook soup/congee/cereal again. I could not find the answer from the Trouble Shooting page. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pebble

customer_reviews.title: Works slowly
customer_reviews.text: After using it for 3 months it works fine and is easy to clean however it takes 40-45 minutes to cook rice. My old rice cooker with the same capacity took no longer than 20. It just seems too long, I could cook it on the stove faster.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Rod Dad

customer_reviews.title: Prefect Rice and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: It makes perfectly well cooked rice in 45 minutes. I followed the cooking instructions and I have not had any problems what’s so ever cooking white rice! The digital counter is a big positive because you will always know how much longer it will be until done. It is very easy and fast to clean. I bought it just to cook rice “ONLY” and nothing else fancy and I am very happy with it and I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Too small for family cooking
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product because the capacity is too small and not what I am looking for. Be mindful that a “rice” measuring cup is not the standard cup measurement used in baking, but much smaller. If you need it for cooking for 1-2 persons or you enjoy rice occasionally, then this is right for you. But for daily family cooking this is too small. I am not reviewing product quality and performance because I did not use the product.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of this rice cooker.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the controls. They are not intuitive and seem quirky to adjust. I would not advise this unit and would not purchase this again. For the price, there are better and more rice makers out there. The main issue is the odd timer controls or lack of them.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunagain

customer_reviews.title: this product is definitely great, but..
customer_reviews.text: the only reason i gave it a 3 star is because of the way it was marketed, it's my fault that i saw 8 cups and went to the reviews immediately and bought it. i did not realize it was 8 cups "COOKED" and only 4 for uncooked. We are doing 5 every day so this won't work and have to return it. I ordered another one though but a different brand. I'm sure this product is awesome though.
customer_reviews.author: JERBETS

customer_reviews.title: Size information is false.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this for my mom since we eat a lot of rice as a Latino family and the 4 cups uncooked capacity was perfect for us and having a few guests. It does not have a 4 cup uncooked rice capacity. The box says it does, and at the time of writing this the website does as well, but upon opening it you'll find it's too small for that and the instruction manual reflects this saying it has a 2 cup capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T. Seaman

customer_reviews.title: Simple Works great
customer_reviews.text: Honestly havent had any issues with this one. I've used and owned other rice makers in the past and this is by far the easiest to use, and makes great rice consistently every time. the inner pot is removable for cleaning, just remember to wash under the lid. Also do not submerge the entire thing in water. My mom tried to clean mine the other day and it killed so I had to buy another one. Otherwise great product, obviously would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Seller Don't Stand By What They Sell Made it 30 Days
customer_reviews.text: The reason for my low rating of this product is that on the 30th day of me using this product it stopped working. I'm into fitness, so I eat a lot of rice. This product made it so easy for me to have my rice ready with four meals a day. I've attempted to reach the seller 2 times with no response back. All I really wanted was a replacement. I was not going to write a bad review on the product or the seller. Now anybody out there reading this message don't purchase anything from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Nero

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage
customer_reviews.text: Stay away! After 3 uses all the plastic on the inside is rattling around. Probably something to do with the terrible burning smell the first time I used it. Cooks white rice just fine. Does not cook brown rice or grains properly. Timer jumps time and when it goes off you have a pot full of water and uncooked rice. What a waste this thing it. So much for trying a "brand name" rice cooker for a change.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: tossed in two asian cups (apparently they are smaller then a standard cup) fill to the 2nd line and clicked the white rice option. worked great except there was alot of water that blew through the top had to place on a towel for the rest of the cooking but im pretty sure that was user error of some sort, will try again tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: demized empire

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, I was unsure if I wanted one until I got it now idk how I lived without It. It makes making rice and other grains so easy, dinner is so much quicker and more convenient to make with this!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Cooks without a mess and easy to clean, wish it worked better for steaming
customer_reviews.text: Love how it doesn't spill anything anywhere and when you open the lid, all the steam water goes into the little plastic pouch that you can then pour out. I use this for cooking rice and quinoa. Tried to use the steaming option but it doesn't work very well. Also wish that brown rice cooking option didn't take an hour to finish!
customer_reviews.author: R. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Standard rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: It cooks and keeps rice as needed, but I was surprised by the cooking times. It takes my unit about 40 minutes to cook white rice and an hour to cook brown rice, which was disappointing because I've known other rice cookers that take only 20 minutes for white rice. Even stovetop cooking at my slowest has only been a 30-minute wait, so I'd recommend preparing rice well in advance of when you plan to eat if you decide to buy this rice cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Ewuraesi

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for perfect rice every time.
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to use. When steaming other foods at the same time as making rice, though, keep your rice to a very small volume. I tried cooking chicken with rice and too much rice cause it to not cook as nicely as I would have liked. Cooking just rice, though, it's FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Bondor

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this rice cooker because it is easy to use. For some reason I cannot cook rice but this makes my rice perfect every time. I put one cup of rice and 1 and 1/2 cups of water; perfect rice everytime. I use the steamer to and it works great. great. The only issue is is that the steamer basket is small. You can't steam a lot of vegetables at all at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Appliance!
customer_reviews.text: This guy cooks up Jasmine rice PERFECTLY every single time, and it's so easy. Easily one of the best kitchen items I've ever bought, wish I had gotten this years ago! Those complaining about their rice turning brown because of the 'warm' feature, it's your own fault for not monitoring when cooking is complete.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, not very great quality steamer plastic
customer_reviews.text: I used the steamer to steam carrots and sweet potatoes the first time I used it and ended up staining the steamer....haven't been able to get back to white since. Otherwise, it still works great and is super versatile for making all sorts of sides and dishes. So great to be able to fill it up and walk away to let dinner cook!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Brunsman

customer_reviews.title: Falsely advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product was advertised as an 8-cup capacity rice maker. IT DOES NOT HAVE AN 8-CUP CAPACITY! We purchased it to replace our old 8-cup unit that died after 10 years of service. This new unit is small 6-cup unit. It's marked "6-cup capacity" on the inside bowl and also noted in the owners manual. Falsely advertised.
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: Basically a "smart steamer"
customer_reviews.text: I tried using a rice tray in a different Hamilton Beach steamer, but there is no replicating the quality of an actual rice cooker. This one works great, and does an intelligent job of correctly detecting how long to cook the amount of rice you place in, regardless of the default time on the timer. There is a removable cap to let steam out, and the instructions do not mention it at all, so for those wondering, I have chosen to keep it off and haven't run into any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: too slow, 45 minutes for white rice not enough
customer_reviews.text: it takes 45 minutes for white rice, while all the previous rice cookers we have had did it around 20 minutes. Even after 45 minutes, sometimes the rice wouldn't be fully cooked. We are going back to using the simple rice cooker without fancy options but does the job well faster.
customer_reviews.author: Packers12

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love my rice cooker! Almost too much. It's so easy. Dump in water, rice, and push a button. Only thing is the cook time is too long. White rice is set for 45minutes but it cooks quicker so I keep an eye on it and stop about 10 minutes short. Otherwise I WOULD RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: LoriAdamsBooks

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than thought
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than thought I had read 8 cups but their measuring cup by is the one that is in it not a normal cup size. We eat to much rice in our household like it probably would have made enough for just my husbands meal. It was nice looking and it was neat that it came with all of the stuff inside.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor cerda

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooker for Brown Rice
customer_reviews.text: We needed a cooker that can cook brown rice well. This cooker delivered! Happy we got it and at a good price too.
customer_reviews.author: pfs

customer_reviews.title: Versatel
customer_reviews.text: I use this to cook meals, in my hotel room, when I travel. It is versatile but around the lid is a bit hard to clean. Would still recommend this since it is easy to program and use.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is the best rice cooker for the money. makes better rice than other ones in the same price range. I have only tried white and brown rice, so I havent used it as a steamer or for other "grains", but I am more than pleased at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Chrietzberg

customer_reviews.title: My First Rice Cooker and I Love It
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is just the perfect size, especially if you have a a lot of other appliances in your kitchen. It certainly cooks the rice evenly compared to cooking it on the stove. You don't have to worry about burning the bottom of the rice! Besides rice you can use this to make soups and steam vegetables!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rice Every Time
customer_reviews.text: This is ridiculously easy to use, and makes perfect rice every time. Measure water, rice, & just click the button. I like the ability to keep the rice warm for up to 12 hours as well. This way I can make some for lunch, and still have it ready for dinner. Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker looks very nice but it is to small for a family of three. The description said that can make 8 cups but by it's size I think you can only make 1.5 cup of rice. It could be perfect for a single person or college student but not for a family.
customer_reviews.author: Emyarsan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for busy lifestyles
customer_reviews.text: Love it, spectacualr. The inside under the metal plates at the top ans bottom are a bit difficult to clean, but other than that its absolutely perfect for quickly throwing together a light meal. Takes a while to cook but its like 0 effort, so its lovely for busy people like me.
customer_reviews.author: William Riley Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best for Thai Jasmine rice with less than normal water added.
customer_reviews.text: Best used with Thai Hom Mali (Thai Jasmine Rice). The white rose Japanese style rice gets a little mushy unless done perfectly. Best to use little water or less than normal amount of water by 20% or so. When done open lid after 3 min turn off rice cooker (do NOT leave on "warm") and let steam escape for a few minutes then fluff the rice especially making sure none is stuck to bottom, close lid loosely (do not engage latch) allowing some moisture to escape. The unused portion of Thai Jasmine rice will be perfect next day for fried rice. Cheers :)
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Failed very soon
customer_reviews.text: If you want a product to fail in 4 months or less buy this cooker. From one day to the next the cooker got stuck on boil and after unplugging from power, it won't come on at all. It has some nifty settings. Not well designed product because the cover door does not separate from the cooker, so the top cover is hard to clean. Many times I had to scrub the cover door while upside down under the kitchen faucet so as not to get any water into the main body compartment. I would not buy again! Even if it is a Garage Sale for $1!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Love that nonstick coating, a feature that I really missed when cleaning the predecessor of this cooker. Very easy to use - turn it on, select what you're cooking - yes, just two button pushes - and that's it. Simple. Easy. And it works.
customer_reviews.author: FPG

customer_reviews.title: durable instant pot!
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice. I love it so much. I used to own the Aroma instant pot and the interior became sticky after 2 months. It became really difficult to clean and the steam holder (the little plastic transparent container) stinks if i dont dump the water every time. But this one doesnt have any of these problems, which is surprising. I already have it for 2 months or so and it still feels like new. Cooking for 3 people or less, this is sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: cw

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: This is a stupid product. It takes about 20 minutes to cool white rice in a normal pot, this one takes 45 minutes! What’s the point? Also it comes out mushy which is a clear indication that it’s overcooking. Don’t buy this nonesense
customer_reviews.author: Jack Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my rice cooker. It was exactly as described. I’ve used it for rice & grains and it comes out perfect every time. Love that the warming function turns off after a period of time, in case I forget to turn it off I don’t have to worry.
customer_reviews.author: Dani M.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy
customer_reviews.text: My family and I absolutely love this product. We use it every day. One heads up. Do not follow the cooking directions to a T...trial and error is better until you have a perfect rice or vegetable meal.
customer_reviews.author: Carline Olivier-Guerrier

customer_reviews.title: Amazing rice cooker!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my girlfriend love this thing! Makes perfect rice everytime and its easy to use. The other piece of crap we had wore out, this rice cooker is a thousand times better. Easy to use with simple instructions and measuring tools, along with being dead simple to clean. I highly reccomned this to any small families. It doesn't cook a crazy amount of rice so I'd say it's perfect for 2 or 3 people.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smaller family of 4
customer_reviews.text: Still using this for a while before review and it’s still working fine! Easy to use. One stop. I could use slightly larger but it does the trick. We’re a family of four. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Matthew w Greene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rice every time!!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is MAGIC!!! Literally perfect rice every time!! I don’t know how I survived before owning a rice cooker!! Easy to use and operate too!! Totally recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Good little rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Great rice cooker and vegetable steamer for me. I do one person meals with mine and it's the perfect size. For more people it may be a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not wht I was expecting!
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok if I hadn’t used I’d return it bc it doesn’t work properly!! It will go from 45 mins to almost done bk to 35 more mins or 12 it jumps all over and last time I checked it dnt tk 2 hrs to make rice!!
customer_reviews.author: ALW

customer_reviews.title: Lies about capacity
customer_reviews.text: Lied about capacity . It clearly says that it holds up too 8 cups of rice. It only holds up too 4 cups of cooked rice, and arrives with this little scooper claming to be a measuring cup that does not meat standerd cup size. This is the “cup” of measurement you use. I am not upset about anything but your diseatful sales tactics. You should be ashamed of yourself.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia elena garza

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little cooker. Having recently purchased it, we have used it four times, and each time our Jasmine rice has turned out perfectly cooked. We also have used the steamer basket to cook zucchini squash, and it too turned out perfectly. It's easy to set up and to clean. Looks clean and modern in design. It doesn't take much space on the counter top or in the storage pantry. All in all very satisfied. We will update in the future as our use continues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker exceeded my expectations. I bought it as a gift and I used it to show my friend on how to operate and I love it. I may have to re-order it for myself.
customer_reviews.author: dlayla

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and a great price
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t just for rice. I steam vegetables and other items. I am so satisfied with this product. I would gift this for child this year. Everyone should own one.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Anne

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Frontliner !!!
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived today after waiting for it for few weeks . I don’t know how it works because when it arrived it was damaged . I’m so disappointed right because I needed a new one. I’m hesitant to order again . I don’t know if it will cost me more to return this or just get another one somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELICA

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of struggling to cook nice on the stove. Nice this has options for the type of rice and also to steam items as well. Perfect for small family.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy C

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love rice so this is a great product for me. Very easy to use. Just measure the rice in the provided measuring cup, fill the water to the line, plug it in and walk away.
customer_reviews.author: Mewsicteach

customer_reviews.title: It’s no good for me.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for rice, it comes out mushy even when I use less water more water I’ve tried it all. It also takes so long I might as well cook it myself in a pot. I’ve had other rice cookers that didn’t take this long.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Debruyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a family of 4, does not take up too much space on the counter. keeps food warm. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make steam rice for my 9 year old who will eat nothing else. It’s so easy to use that he makes his own rice. The pot gets hot but he wears oven mitts
customer_reviews.author: For Reals Mom

customer_reviews.title: This product does not work properly at all.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely did not like this. When you start it it says that it will be done in a certain amount of minutes and then when you go to check on it when you think it’s done it will add 30 minutes to it then you’ll come and check it again and there might be another 20 minutes added to it and it does this repeatedly. This does not work well at all. Do not buy it
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY A POLLARD

customer_reviews.title: Mushy rice
customer_reviews.text: The rice came out so mushy and you have to make so much of it. What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: My rice turns out perfect and I can add ingredients before cooking
customer_reviews.text: My rice turns out perfect and I can add ingredients before cooking. I also used it to "steam" fruit, adding sugar and had the easiest jam I've ever made. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: rnbjm

customer_reviews.title: Great rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: This my first time using an electric rice cooker and I am delighted with this one. I love how it cooks the rice, the fact that I just dump it in there and let it do the work and it keeps the rice warm till I turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: it MOLDS!
customer_reviews.text: The cap is not removable and the plastic has molded 3 times now even though I wipe it down every time! I am going to just throw this crap out
customer_reviews.author: Marjan Mahdjoubi

customer_reviews.title: too bad!
customer_reviews.text: Too bad about this rice cooker! It stopped working after a month!
customer_reviews.author: mia

customer_reviews.title: Small and time cinsuming
customer_reviews.text: It’s compact a lot smaller than I’m used to. I had another rice cooker purchased at that price but was much bigger. It also was faster at cooking rice. This one takes 45 minutes for white rice, my old one took 25 minutes which is average time.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Zito

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for me and another for my Dad. I love it. My rice comes out perfect each and every time. While I have no problem making rice on the stove, what attracted me to this product is that it safely keeps my rice warm. As an aside, I make rice as per the instructions on the bag of rice. Not as instructed in the rice cooker manual.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mauras

customer_reviews.title: Not the best value for money
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent little rice cooker and that's the good thing about it. On the flip side, it's super slow. 45 minutes for rice no matter how much. And then there is this non-stick coating that starts peeling off. I am considering buying an instapot ..should have done that before buying this.
customer_reviews.author: The eternal optimist

customer_reviews.title: Essential Purchase for rice cooking
customer_reviews.text: I love rice. I used to suck at making it. This rice cooker has changed my life. I can now make awesome rice and other grains. I love this thing. Essential purchase. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my broken very expensive rice cooker with this. It works great but does take a lot longer. But good results
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure it said it cooked beans. After I received it, there is no where in the manual says it does. I’ve tried using it 5 times I cannot seem to get it right. I’m ready to give up on this product. Plus I do not like where the steam comes out and the way the lid opens. I’ve burned my self bad
customer_reviews.author: Misty heller

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Great for both brown and white rice
customer_reviews.text: Definitely splurge for the programmable rice cooker. Esp if you plan to make brown rice. (It has its own setting that makes it fluffy). The inside lid gets starchy and it takes a good bit of wiping down to get it all removed. The interior canister where the rice cooks is dishwasher safe- so that parts easy :)
customer_reviews.author: Dawn W.

customer_reviews.title: Rice can't stand long time in this machine
customer_reviews.text: Rice is great like everyone said right after normal cook. I tried to leave the rice in the cooker for over 12 hours, some part of the rice was saturated and became mushy. And the bottom part dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Chen

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Easy to use. Use it daily for making white rice; haven’t tried for veggies or other grains.
customer_reviews.author: puebloan

customer_reviews.title: Rice rice
customer_reviews.text: Got this to start cooking fried rice. Don’t use 5 minute rice, use legit rice, long grain/jasmine/etc. That was a rookie mistake on my part, you just get oatmeal basically. Works perfect with the right rice. Excited to try it with other vegetables too
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Best we’ve owned!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had a couple rice makers in our time and this one is by far the best! We make rice a couple times a week so this gets a lot of use. Really easy to clean, especially when you realize how easy it is to remove the metal plate attached to the lid (it slides right off so you can clean the back of it).
customer_reviews.author: SDB

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 for a first time rice cooker.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use, cooks rice in a reasonable amount of time for the price point, and the warming functions works. Everything was easy to clean and the inner pot really is nonstick. An overall, great addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Tondra Moore

customer_reviews.title: Small cooker
customer_reviews.text: I thought is big rice cooker. Always make a lot of rice like 5-6 cups a day, however I’m going to keep it. Maybe my partner helps to reduce rice. Lol
customer_reviews.author: A.n.Jell

customer_reviews.title: Good rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Note the size I thought it was going to be bigger so I could use it for stews. But it's perfect as a rice cooker and vege steamer
customer_reviews.author: scullydavidson

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooker
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My first rice cooker and it’s easy to use and is a great size. Fits nicely on my counter top.
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a dorm
customer_reviews.text: Small, but my fault for not reading. Takes 45 minutes to cook rice, (I'm used to 10mins) Having to keep hitting the keep warm button to keep my rice warm.
customer_reviews.author: SomGuyOnAmazon

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Digital Programmable Rice Cooker & Food Steamer, 8 Cups Cooked (4 Uncooked), With Steam & Rinse Basket, Stainless Steel (37518)
product_meta.description: Style:Rice CookerMaking a complete and balanced meal in the Hamilton Beach Electric Rice Cooker and Steamer is as easy as placing the ingredients in the bowl and turning it on. Not only does it cook rice and whole grains perfectly, but an integrated basket can be used to steam seafood, poultry and vegetables even while the rice cooks below. That means with just a few presses of a button, it’s quick and easy to serve salmon with kale and quinoa one night and chicken and broccoli over white rice the next. The 2-in-1 steamer basket can also be used to rinse grains before cooking, which prevents clumping and results in a fresher taste. Clean up is a snap with the dishwasher safe nonstick cooking pot. Its compact size makes for easy storage. Cooking healthy, delicious meals doesn’t get any simpler than that.
feature_bullets: Make more than rice: Make rice, whole grains, hot cereal, steamed vegetables and much more
Healthy, one pot meals: Steam seafood or veggies while rice cooks below
Pre-programmed settings: Cook and steam food at the touch of a button
2 to 8 cup capacity: Makes between 2 to 8 cups of cooked rice or whole grains
2 in 1 basket: Includes rice rinser/steam basket

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,009 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
